item.title: Maine Becomes the Latest State to Sue Oil Companies Over Climate Change
item.description: In a new lawsuit, the state’s attorney general claims oil companies deceived the public about fossil fuel products’ contributions to climate change.

item.title: Record Number of Travelers Expected Over Thanksgiving Week
item.description: Bad weather threatens roads over the holiday, but security lines were moving quickly at Chicago’s main airport on Tuesday.

item.title: PCE, a Key Inflation Measure, Sped Up in October
item.description: Inflation has been stubborn in recent months. Now, President-elect Donald J. Trump’s tariffs loom as a potential risk.

item.title: Britain’s Emotional Debate Over Assisted Dying.
item.description: As lawmakers prepare to vote on legalizing assisted suicide for the terminally ill in England and Wales, an intense public discussion has unfolded.

item.title: 3 Americans Are Said to Be Freed From China in Prisoner Swap
item.description: The three men, John Leung, Kai Li and Mark Swidan, are on planes heading to the United States, officials said.
